menuItems.title: Decorative Painting
menuItems.description: Desire is the quiet architect of human behavior, and the orectic impulse—our innate drive toward what we crave—shapes every facet of life. From the hunger that fuels survival to the yearning for connection, beauty, or truth, orectic energy pulses beneath our choices.
